entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of snow and blowing snow. Low minus 24.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow changing to flurries at times heavy near midnight and ending before morning then clearing. Risk of snow squalls overnight. Blowing snow overnight. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming northwest 40 gusting to 60 near midnight. Low minus 24. Wind chill minus 10 this evening and minus 35 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Sunny. Temperature falling to minus 28 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Sunny. Local blowing snow. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature falling to minus 28 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 35 in the morning and minus 44 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Thursday 02 February 2023
